name: Mali Effugium
description:
Mali Effugium is a game of the side-scrolling and platformer  genres with 2D camera and pixel art graphics that takes place in a fictional world of medieval fantasy. There are 3 playable characters: the thief, the archer, and the tank, each with specific attributes and abilities. The player controls only one character at a time.

Status: in development

Controls:

arrow keys - move character and camera

space bar - jump

E - interact

shift - ability 1

ctrl - ability 2

1, 2 and 3 - change character (this function is only enabled at the fourth level of the playtest)
